content:
Hey all! :wave: Would anybody be interested in putting together a stabilization PR for std::hint::spin_loop? There's some notes on what we want to do here: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/55002#issuecomment-676239111

If you'd like to give it a shot but are not totally sure where to start I'd be happy to work through it with you!
i can work on it, might take a whle though
Or me, it will also take a while (maybe a few days). I would do if no one else wants to take up the tasks but @DPC work on it now.
